summary: This mod fixes some of the meshes so that the snow effect is showing when using Wet and Cold. Should also be compatible with Frostfall or mods using the same effect.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][size=3][u][b][i][color=#93c47d]Description:
[/color][/i][/b][/u]
The excellent mod by Dragten: Bandolier - Bags and Pouches is well-know for its immersive feel and I have used it in my mod setup from the first time I modded Skyrim. Unfortunately some of the meshes didn't showÂ  the snow effect from Wet and Cold in snowy weather conditions and had some lighting issues as well. Upon inspection, I observed that the snow effect was applied on the inside of the mesh. So I opened Blender and fixed the inverted normals and some of the meshes and applied some tangents and bitangents in Nifskope. I also ran Nifscan on the meshes and fixed any errors I could find. Note that the meshes have not been altered in size i.e. they still clip with custom/some armors and clothes.

Upon user request and thanks to the permission of Pfuscher I have changed my meshes to be compatible with his mod: Upgrade for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches. Unfortunately this patch will only show the glassy and snow effect but the transparency will be lost due to an incompatibility with the Alpha Properties used by both the transparency effect and the snow shader.

[u][color=#93c47d][b][i]Installation:[/i][/b][/color][/u]

[/size][/font][u][font=Arial][size=3]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches Patch:[/size][/font][/u]
[font=Arial][size=3]
Extract the meshes and [font=Arial][size=3][font=Arial][size=3][b]only one[/b][/size][/font][/size][/font] ESP into your Skyrim/Data folder. Install / Load the mod after Bandolier - Bags and Pouches. If you use the original mod by Dragten please install the updated DR_Bandolier.esp. If you use CCOR use the updated Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade.esp.

[u]Bandolier - Dawnguard Patch:[/u]

[font=Arial][size=3]Extract the meshes into your Skyrim/Data folder.[/size][/font] The Dawnguard Patch must be installed and loaded after the Bandolier - Dawnguard addon.

[u]Upgrade for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches:[/u]

[font=Arial][size=3]Extract the meshes and [b]only one[/b] ESP into your Skyrim/Data folder.[/size][/font] Load the Upgrade for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches Patch after Pfuschers Mod. [font=Arial][size=3]If you use the original mod by Dragten please install the updated DR_Bandolier.esp. If you use CCOR use the updated Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade.esp.[/size][/font]

[u][color=#93c47d][b][i]Future Plans:[/i][/b][/color]
[/u]
I will take a look at the meshes and change their size / position to get a better fit to the body if I find the time.

[u][color=#93c47d][b][i]Acknowledgements:[/i][/b][/color]
[/u]
Thanks to Dragten I got his permission to upload my modified files as a patch and thanks again to Pfuscher for giving me permission to release a patch for his mod.

[u][color=#93c47d][i][b]NB:[/b][/i][/color][/u]

The screenshots have been taken with a modified version of RealVision ENB.

Feel free to leave me some comments in case of any errors with my patch. Youre welcome to add screenshots showing the effect with other mods using the snow effect e.g Frostfall but please keep it SFW.[/size][/font]
author: Dragten SwatchSilver and Pfuscher

files.name: Bandolier - Bags and Pouches Patch
files.changelogHtml:
Corrected some of the meshes again and optimized them with nifscope. Removed unused strings. Fixed the wrong texture paths in the ESPs for the dark bandolier.
Added a glasslike effect to the vial meshes and changed the according entries in the ESPs. Transparency was omitted due to incompatibilities with the snow effect shader.

files.name: Upgrade for Bandolier - Bags and Pouches Patch
